subject: Welcome to Gmail
body: Thanks for creating a Google account. We're glad you're here!

subject: Top stories this week
body: Check out the most read stories from your favorite writers.

subject: Your order has been shipped
body: Your order #123456 has been shipped and will arrive soon.

subject: Weekend plans?
body: Hey! Are we still on for the movie this weekend?

subject: New comment on your pull request
body: Someone commented on your recent pull request.

subject: Unusual sign-in detected
body: We detected a sign-in attempt from a new device. Was this you?

subject: Your trip is coming up!
body: Get ready for your stay in Cox's Bazar next week.

subject: New jobs that match your profile
body: Here are 5 new jobs you might be interested in.

subject: You appeared in 10 searches this week
body: Your profile is getting noticed! See who's viewing it.

subject: Your course starts tomorrow
body: Don't forget! Your Python course begins tomorrow. Good luck!
